hadith.text: This hadith has been transmitted on the same authority but with this variation that the hadith transmitted on the authority of Nabra (the words are):One who is better than I informed me, and he was Abu Qatada, and in the hadith transmitted on the authority of Khalid instead of the word 'bu'us' there is 'wayys' or 'ya wayys', i.e., " how sad it is
